Package shaharas

package shaharas
  • Class
    Description
    Add
    The Add class represents the addition operator (`+`).
    AddEQL
    The AddEQL class represents the `+=` operator.
    AddOneLeft
    The AddOneLeft class represents the pre-increment operator (`++variable`).
    AddOneRight
    The AddOneRight class represents the post-increment operator (`variable++`).
    BaseBinaryOperators
    The BaseBinaryOperators class is an abstract class that represents binary operators in the system.
    BaseOperators
    The BaseOperators class serves as an abstract base class for all operator classes in the system.
    BaseUnaryOperators
    The BaseUnaryOperators class represents the general structure and behavior for unary operators in the system.
    BoundaryTest
    The BoundaryTest class contains test cases to verify the boundary conditions and edge cases for mathematical operations such as addition and division.
    CalculatorTest
    The CalculatorTest class contains test cases for verifying the functionality of basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
    CloseParen
    The CloseParen class represents a closing parenthesis operator in the expression parser.
    Controller
    The Controller class serves as the main coordinator for reading input expressions, calculating results, and printing the output.
    Div
    The Div class represents the division binary operator ("/") for performing integer division operations.
    DivEQL
    The DivEQL class represents the division equal-to operator ("/=") for performing integer division and updating the left operand with the result.
    EdgeCasesTest
    The EdgeCasesTest class contains test cases for verifying the behavior of arithmetic operations in edge cases.
    Equals
    The Equals class represents the equality operator ("="), typically used for checking whether two values are equal.
    Expression
    This class represents an expression and its evaluation.
    FileOperationsTest
    The FileOperationsTest class contains unit tests for verifying the file reading and writing functionality within the calculator system.
    IncrementDecrementTest
    The IncrementDecrementTest class contains unit tests for verifying the correct behavior of increment and decrement operations on variables.
    InRead
    Interface for reading and processing expressions from a source.
    IntegrationTest
    The IntegrationTest class tests the integration of different components, such as operator factory and operator calculation.
    Main
    Main class for executing the application.
    Mul
    Represents the multiplication operator in the expression evaluator.
    MulEQL
    Represents the multiplication assignment operator (a *= b) in the expression evaluator.
    OpenParen
    Represents the open parenthesis (`(`) operator in the expression evaluator.
    OperatorInfo
    The `OperatorInfo` class holds information about an operator in a mathematical expression.
    Operators
    The Operators interface defines the contract for all operator classes in the program.
    OperatorsFactory
    The `OperatorsFactory` class is responsible for registering and managing mathematical operators and variable operations.
    OperatorsFactoryTest
    The OperatorsFactoryTest class tests the functionality of the OperatorsFactory class.
    OperatorsTest
    The OperatorsTest class tests the calculation methods of the operators in the 'shaharas' package.
    OutPrint
    The `OutPrint` interface defines the contract for classes that are responsible for printing or displaying the output of the calculations, typically including variables and their final values.
    PatternsUtils
    Utility class that holds the regular expression patterns for various types of operators, assignment operations, variable and number patterns, and parentheses.
    PerformanceTest
    The PerformanceTest class is designed to test the performance of the calculation system, specifically the efficiency of handling a large number of operations.
    PrintOutputConsole
    Implements the OutPrint interface to print the contents of variables to the console.
    PrintOutputConsoleTest
    The PrintOutputConsoleTest class is designed to test the functionality of the PrintOutputConsole class.
    PrintOutputFile
    Implements the OutPrint interface to write the contents of variables to a specified file.
    ReadInputConsole
    Implements the InRead interface to read user input from the console.
    ReadInputFile
    Implements the InRead interface to read expressions from a file.
    Sub
    The Sub class represents the subtraction operator ('-') in an expression evaluator system.
    SubEQL
    The SubEQL class represents the subtraction assignment operator ('-=') in an expression evaluator system.
    SubOneLeft
    The SubOneLeft class represents the pre-decrement operator (--variable) in an expression evaluator system.
    SubOneRight
    The SubOneRight class represents the post-decrement operator (variable--) in an expression evaluator system.
    Utilities
    The Utilities class is a utility class that provides constant values used throughout the expression evaluation system.
    VariableEXP
    The VariableEXP class represents a variable in an expression with a name and a value.
    VariableEXPTest
    The VariableEXPTest class is designed to test the functionality of the VariableEXP class.
    VectorParser
    The VectorParser class is responsible for parsing command-line arguments passed to the program.
